name: Articuno
lore: Articuno is a Legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. It is said to appear to doomed travelers lost in icy regions.

name: Zapdos
lore: Zapdos is a Legendary bird Pokémon that has the ability to control electricity. It is said to nest in thunderclouds and appear during storms.

name: Moltres
lore: Moltres is a Legendary bird Pokémon that embodies fire. It is said to bring early spring to the wintry lands it visits.

name: Lugia
lore: Lugia is said to be the guardian of the seas. It slumbers at the bottom of the ocean to avoid causing storms with its power.

name: Ho-Oh
lore: Ho-Oh is said to bring happiness to those who see it. Its feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light.
